name: Conga Line (ilovemedia)
description:
Conga Line!

1. Use the keyboard arrows to guide the leader up, down, right, or left.

2. When the characters kick or jump, if there is a character waiting next to the last character, the character will join the conga.

3. When all eight characters are in the conga, guide the leader to the exit tile.

This game has been created to experiment with interactive music, specifically to learn how to send events from Unity to Wwise and from Wwise to Unity. I've created a video explaining the whole process of creating the audio for this game. You can see it here (in spanish):

Do you want to try another cute rhythm game? Try Encounters: Music Stories, available for switch and mobile. The characters in this game have been extracted from there: https://encountersgame.com/
